section.title: CentOS Studio Files and Folders
section.para: CentOS Studio has several key files and folders, listed in the table below.

row.entry: CentOS Studio looks for this file to locate centosstudio configuration. See the centosstudio and centosstudio.conf man pages for more information. This file is optional and does not exist in the default CentOS Studio installation.
Python code for CentOS Studio, where $version is the Python version.
Documentation for CentOS Studio, where $version is the CentOS Studio version.
Relax NG schemas for system definition validation.
CentOS Studio stores cached content in this folder. See the centosstudio and centosstudio.conf man pages for cache-related options.
CentOS Studio publishes completed solutions to this folder by default. An alternative location can be specified on a per-system-repository basis within a system definition.
